name: Electroplankton
description:
Electroplankton is an arcade game developed by Nintendo. It came out on 09-01-2006. Nintendo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Electroplankton on Nintendo DS and Wii.
Shigeru Miyamoto and Toru Osawa produced the game. It was directed by Toshio Iwai. Koichi Kyuma and Yuichi Ozaki scored the game.
